tasks.help: Click the --> button to start the copy
tasks.name: Begin Course Copy

tasks.help: If there is any content, don't do the copy
tasks.name: Check for Content

tasks.help: Delete 'Student Introductions' and 'Questions and Answers'
tasks.name: Delete Discussions

tasks.help: Delete all pages except University Information
tasks.name: Delete Pages

tasks.help: 'Restrict students from viewing course before term start date' should be enabled and 'Participation' should be 'Course'
tasks.name: Verify Settings

tasks.help: Double check the email to make sure you copy the right course
tasks.name: Copy Content

tasks.help: Copy the current holiday from the SE University Holidays course (select content)
tasks.name: Copy Holiday

tasks.help: Delete any duplicate menu items. The original item is the first one listed
tasks.name: Delete Duplicate Menu Items

tasks.help:
Move the items in the navigation menu to this order:

Home
Announcements
Syllabus
Modules
Grades
Submit Grades
People
SE Email
Henry G. Bennett Library
Tech Support
Tutor.com
YuJa
Panorama
Lockdown Browser
Item Banks
Credentials
Follett Discover
(whatever else happens to be there)
tasks.name: Fix Menu Order

tasks.help: Click the Auto-Move button, then the arrow in the bottom left
tasks.name: Move Content

tasks.help: Click the Remove Empty button, then the arrow in the bottom left
tasks.name: Delete Empty Modules

tasks.help: Click the Add Dates button, wait for them to publish, then drag them to the top of their respective modules
tasks.name: Add Date Headers

tasks.help: Delete any GOLD Orientation and the University Information items which are NOT at the bottom of the START HERE module
tasks.name: Delete Old GOLD

tasks.help: Move the holiday module into place
tasks.name: Move Holiday

tasks.help: Delete any duplicate Question and Answer or Student Introductions discussions
tasks.name: Delete Duplicate Discussions

tasks.help: Delete any undeployed GOLD Orientation assignments and empty categories
tasks.name: Delete Duplicate Assignments

tasks.help: Use https://k.ngn.tf/8775a to fix broken images; manually fix broken module links
tasks.name: Fix Homepage

tasks.help: Make sure the dates are correct, especially regarding the holiday-adjacent weeks
tasks.name: Check Assignment Dates

tasks.help: Check for Blackboard references, as well as getting the grade total / weights
tasks.name: Check Syllabus

tasks.help: Make sure it matches the syllabus
tasks.name: Check Gradebook

tasks.help: If any real links are broken, inform the professor
tasks.name: Run Link Validator

tasks.help: Ensure that all the steps on the Google Sheet have been followed. If something there isn't covered in the automation, lmk
tasks.name: Check Google Sheet

tasks.help: Excellent work, 47. The money has been wired to your account
tasks.name: Done
